preqs: MGB2430, MGC2430, MGG2430, MGF2661 or MGW2430

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB2430, MGC2430, MGF2661, MGG2430, MGW2430} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit explores the HRM theory and practice of managing workforces globally. Topics may include workforce planning in a global context, design of work processes and systems, and risk management in a dynamic environment.
